    • Constructor Detail

      • FloatAnimator

        public FloatAnimator(float start,
             float end,
             long duration)
        Creates new instance.
        Parameters:
        start - start value.
        end - end value.
        duration - duration, in milliseconds. This should not be long, as delay value between animation frame is just 1 millisecond.
